mapper.insert: insert into user(id, pwd, email, phone) values(#{id},#{pwd},#{email},#{phone})
mapper.select: select * from user where id = #{id} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.update: update user set lastlogin = now() where id = #{id}
update user set pwd = #{pwd} , email = #{email} , phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
